author: andyc
msg: 1) Removed old XML Schema code that was not being used. This code
is intended to be replaced by either a port of the Xerces 1.x
XML Schema implementation or by a re-designed, re-implemented
2) Updated standard parser configuration to separate DTD validation
and namespace binding in the parsing pipeline.

author: elena
msg: compile failure: remove X1 DOM import statement

author: andyc
msg: Adding XML Schema porting files from Xerces 1.x codebase.

author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug in scanner that allowed the built-in entity references
to be sent via XNI. The default value for this feature should have
been false. Also made sure to set the default value in the
standard parser configuration for this feature.
